DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Problem Past Three Month Symptom Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to describe a symptom experienced in the past three months related to prostate disease or disorder.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system.  It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra.  The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen._Problem; a state of difficulty that needs to be resolved._An indication that a person has a condition or disease.  Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A gland in the male reproductive system just below the bladder. It surrounds part of the urethra, the canal that empties the bladder. It produces a fluid that forms part of semen. (NCI-GLOSS):Problem; a state of difficulty that needs to be resolved.

Concepts.definition: The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.

Property.preferredDefinition: An indication that a person has a condition or disease.  Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain.

Concepts.definition: Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: signs that a person has a condition or disease. Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain(NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Past Three Month Prostate Symptom Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.__The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system.  It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra.  The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen._Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The musculocutaneous pouch that encloses the testicles. (NCI): A benign or malignant pathologic structure in any part of the body, resulting from a neoplastic accumulation of cells, inflammatory cells, or cystic changes.

Concepts.definition: The musculocutaneous pouch that encloses the testicles.
A benign or malignant pathologic structure in any part of the body, resulting from a neoplastic accumulation of cells, inflammatory cells, or cystic changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A condition in which free hemoglobin is found in the urine. --2004

Concepts.definition: Blood in the urine.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.: the discharge of urine.

Concepts.definition: The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.
The discharge of urine.

PermissibleValues.value: I need help answering this question

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Required; necessary, not optional.: The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.

Concepts.definition: Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 1/25/23 added alt name for ticket number CADSR0001948 for CCTG cjl.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Discharge; the pouring forth of a fluid.: An external male reproductive organ. It contains a tube called the urethra, which carries semen and urine to the outside of the body.

Concepts.definition: The pouring forth of a fluid.
The male organ of urination and copulation.

PermissibleValues.value: Getting up more than once a night to urinate

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Frequent episodes of urination during the night.

Concepts.definition: Frequent episodes of urination during the night.

PermissibleValues.value: Sensation of not emptying bladder completely after you finished urinating

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Accumulation of urine within the bladder because of the inability to urinate.

Concepts.definition: Accumulation of urine within the bladder because of the inability to urinate.

PermissibleValues.value: Urinating more than once every two hours during the day

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Coming at short intervals.: the discharge of urine.

Concepts.definition: Coming at short intervals or in great quantities.
The discharge of urine.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.: the discharge of urine.

Concepts.definition: Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
The discharge of urine.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

Concepts.definition: Before the present time.
A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.
